adaptorId.description: A unique identifier for this adaptor instance.
adaptorId.label: Adaptor

adaptorType.description: This specifies the type of adaptor to use.  The value of this field must match an adaptorType that is registered by core or by an extension.
adaptorType.label: Adaptor Type

authorizationHandlerId.description: Id of authorization handler used to control access to resources in this adaptor.
authorizationHandlerId.label: Authorization Handler

journalAdaptorId.brief: The adaptorId that provides journal service for this adaptor
journalAdaptorId.description: This is the id of an adaptor that provides journal service for this adaptor.  This can be this adaptor's own id or a previously defined adaptor's id.  If not specified, no journaling will be performed.
journalAdaptorId.label: Journal Adaptor

title.label: Title
title.description: The title for this configuration component.
title.brief: The title for this configuration component

sourceLocation.label: Source Location
sourceLocation.description: This is a contextual string added when this configuration object is processed.
sourceLocation.brief: Contextual string added when this configuration object is processed

description.label: Description
description.description: The description of this configuration component.
description.brief: The description of this configuration component

modelLocationAdaptorId.label: Model Adaptor
modelLocationAdaptorId.description: This is the id of the adaptor that contains object type _AdaptiveModel_ and related objects.
modelLocationAdaptorId.brief: This is the id of the adaptor that contains object type _AdaptiveModel_ and related objects

modelId.label: Model
modelId.description: The objectId of the _AdaptiveModel_ object in the modelLocationAdaptorId adaptor.
modelId.brief: The objectId of the _AdaptiveModel_ object in the modelLocationAdaptorId adaptor

mappedAdaptorId.label: Mapped Adaptor
mappedAdaptorId.description: This is the default mappedAdaptorId value.
mappedAdaptorId.brief: This is the default mappedAdaptorId value

custom.label: Custom
custom.description: Qualifier custom:: variables available to model expressions.
custom.brief: Qualifier custom:: variables available to model expressions

result.description: Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=adaptor adaptorType=model.
